entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1900 metres rising to 2400 metres this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 6 except minus 1 near Lake Louise.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening. A few flurries near Lake Louise overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 6 except minus 1 near Lake Louise. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
